person.persName: Guy H. Bandy (Kentucky farmer and soldier (U.S.A.))

body.p: Kentucky farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Son William Bandy and Elenor Bandy. Resident of Tazewell County, Virginia in 1850. Farmer in Kentucky in 1864. Served in the Sandy Valley Battalion of the 1st Regiment Capital Guards (U.S.A.) as a private from May 10, 1864 to September 12, 1864. Reported as deserted on September 12, 1864. Served in the 39th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from April 1865 to September 1865.
